description: Aspose.Slides is a PowerPoint management library for working with Microsoft PowerPoint files without using Microsoft PowerPoint. It allows developers to work with PPT, PPS, POT, PPTX, PPSX, POTX and ODP files on ASP.NET web applications, web services and Windows applications.
releaseNotes:
This release introduces the features, enhancements and bug fixes as detailed below:
	

	New Features:

SLIDESNET-3103	Write capability for linked OLE objects
SLIDESNET-31107	Support for inserting HTML and XML content to slide
SLIDESNET-33823	Setting the number format for chart data cell
SLIDESNET-33949	Add support for generating trend lines in the chart series


	Bugs:

SLIDESNET-33252	An EMF image added to a PPT presentation's slide loses it quality
SLIDESNET-33623	Slide text missing in generated thumbnail
SLIDESNET-33901	Slide background color changes in generated PDF
SLIDESNET-33944	Spelling/language information is lost during PPT saving
SLIDESNET-33992	Getting Plot Areas properties return NaN
SLIDESNET-34001	Chart missing in generated thumbnails
SLIDESNET-34002	Chart labels are rendered with wrong color in generated thumbnails
SLIDESNET-34005	PptException thrown on exporting presentation to PDF
SLIDESNET-34006	Slide numbers improperly rendered in generated Pdf
SLIDESNET-34036	Chart failed to load bubble chart symbols
SLIDESNET-34037	Presentation gets corrupted on removing the default series added in chart
SLIDESNET-34038	Chart.CategoryAxis return null for Bubble Chart
SLIDESNET-34039	SmartArt text improperly rendered in generated PDF
SLIDESNET-34059	Presentation repair message on cloning slide with in presentation
SLIDESNET-34064	Wrong category axis labels are rendered in generated PDF
SLIDESNET-34078	The bullet tags inside HTML are missed in generated presentation
SLIDESNET-34081	Presentation repair message on saving PPTX using Aspose.Slides
SLIDESNET-34101	ArgumentOutOfRangeException on loading presentation
SLIDESNET-34107	Unsupported brush type exception on generating XPS
SLIDESNET-34150	PlaceholderEx.Index contains wrong values after loading PPTX presentation
summary: Aspose.Slides is a PowerPoint management library for working with Microsoft PowerPoint files without using Microsoft PowerPoint. It allows developers to work with PPT, PPS, POT, PPTX, PPSX, POTX and ODP files on ASP.NET web applications, web services and Windows applications. It allows you to open files and manipulate the elements of the presentation from adding slides and managing variety of shapes and working with text to more complex elements like presentation protection, slide animations, charts and SmartArt rendering.The presentations can be exported to PDF, TIFF, XPS, SVG, PNG, JPEG, BMP or EMF formats.
title: Aspose.Slides for .NET
